mapper.select: select craft_num_pk, partner_id_fk, craft_name, craft_introduce, craft_specialty, substr(craft_address,0, instr(craft_address, ' ', 1, 2) ) as craft_address, filename from ( select rank() over(order by craft_num_pk) as row_num, craft_num_pk, partner_id_fk, craft_name, craft_introduce, craft_specialty, craft_address, substr(filename, 1, instr(filename, ',', 1, 1)-1 ) as filename from craft ) where row_num <= 6

select review_id_pk, user_id_fk, review_content, order_num_pk, review_date, craft_num_pk, craft_name from ( select row_number() over(order by review_date desc) as rno, review_id_pk, user_id_fk, review_content, order_num_fk as order_num_pk, to_char(review_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') as review_date , craft_num_pk, craft_name from review join ( select craft_num_pk, craft_name from craft ) on craft_num_fk = craft_num_pk ) where rno between 1 and 4
